thread.title: Blizzard is adding voice chat to Battle.net

title: Blizzard is adding voice chat to Battle.net
text:
Blizzard is adding voice chat to Battle.net 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
If you play Hearthstone, Heroes of the Storm of Diablo, you may soon be able to chat with friends and randomers alike using your headset's m...
